Title: Establishes a highway safety corridor on the Southern State Parkway located in Long Island and makes conforming changes
Summary: Establishes a highway safety corridor on the Southern State Parkway located in Long Island and makes conforming changes.
LawCode: Redesig Art 13 to be Art 15, ren §§350 - 354 to be §§400 - 405, add Art 13 §§375 - 375-c, amd §§401 & 402, Hway L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to establishing a highway safety corridor on the Southern State Parkway located in Long Island and to making conforming changes
